name: Mega Man Arena
description:
Did you ever think that Mega Man wouldn't stand a chance if you could take control of Cut Man? Or that Flash Man could really do some damage if he could better use Time Stopper? Maybe Gemini Man could be way more deadly if he took better advantage of his clones? Well, prove it yourself in Mega Man Arena!

​

Tired of all the in-fighting? Team up with allies to take on deadly boss fights. Whether it's the fearsome Mecha Dragon or the gargantuan Gamma, race against the clock for the best time!
